title: Strictly Come Dancing's AJ Pritchard slapped Saffron Barker
text:
To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video

Strictly Come Dancing’s AJ Pritchard admitted he slapped Saffron Barker during Strictly rehearsals so as she would ‘show her angry side’.

That’s definitely one way to do it.

The pair, who were recently forced to deny romance rumours, were playing a playful quiz game on BBC News Beat’s Instagram Stories, with Saffron saying: ‘Earlier this week I got whacked around the face. True or false?’

She later revealed it was true, explaining: ‘AJ was trying to get the angrier side of me to come out so he demonstrates but actually whacked me round the face.

Advertisement

Advertisement

‘I mean both hands, slap! Like, it hurt.’

With the pair set to dance to Everybody Wants To Rule The World by Lorde, the 19-year-old has been showing off her Katniss Everdeen costume – and it involves a whole bunch of real arrows.

AJ might need to watch his step – there could be some retaliation coming his way.

Saffron’s channeling Katniss Everdeen for Movie Week (Picture: Instagram/SaffronBarker)

Saffron and AJ have been hard at work on their Paso Doble, with the YouTube star being all smiles after she was reportedly targeted by hackers.

According to The Sun, there are now increased security concerns over the 19-year-old social media star’s safety on the hit BBC dancing show.

The hackers are said to have taken ‘intimate photos’ from the young star’s iCloud and shared them across the internet.

They show Saffron in various poses in revealing outfits while on holiday, as well as of her in just a towel.

‘This is worrying as Saffron seems to have been targeted because she is on the show,’ a Strictly insider told The Sun.

They continued: ‘Part of the security briefings have been about online security because that is an area that hackers and blackmailers target.

‘There is a fear that Saffron could be threatened with the pictures, or that other more explicit ones could also have been stolen.’

Advertisement

Advertisement

However, never one to let anything get her down, she looks to be thriving on the show as she prepares to strut her stuff into Movie Week

Go on, girl!

Strictly Come Dancing continues Saturday night on BBC One at 6:40pm.

description: Strictly Come Dancing's AJ Pritchard slapped Saffron Barker to show off her 'angry side' after hacker drama.
